Text: Come on... What kind of scenario is this?
I was sure the final boss would be here...

He did seem kinda like a boss... But he was way too
weak for that...

Is this one of those weird events where it's just a
group battle, and there's no boss?
Hmm. I'll check out the basement, just in case.

If there's nothing, I'll go pick up the coins and
head home...
*sigh* I hope I didn't get here too late...

In the now-empty room... Thump, thump. The Queen's
heart taken from the sacrifice begins beating.
Mary and Claire reach the top of the Crimson Tower.
Or the coffin. What happened here?
Does that mean Cid wasn't the sacrifice?
That boy... Always making me worry!
...Ugh! I need to quickly get back into townâ€”

Blood oozes from the wound, and Claire's strength
slowly drains away.
Oh no... No, it can't be...

Her hair is a deep crimson, as are her eyes, and with
her pale skin her proportions are nearly perfect and
feminine.

She looks exactly like the Blood Queen Elisabeth that
Mary remembers.

Elisabeth begins to retract the feeler she used to
pierce Claire.

Unable to resist, Claire is dragged toward
Elisabeth's mouth.

Mary's pleas go unheard, as Elisabeth refuses to
release Claire.

The resurrected Elisabeth is the strongest of the
Progenitors, and there is no way to stop her.
All Mary can do is watch helplessly.

Once again, she was too late. Tears well up in Mary's
eyes.
